function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementing social distancing measures, improving ventilation, and using personal protective equipment","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use easy-to-clean and non-porous interior finishes","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging and facilitating regular access to green areas and natural environments for both children and adults.","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Designating smoking areas away from common balconies","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Focus on cooperation between company, tier-1 and tier-2 suppliers, and disruptions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improve detection methods and adjust decay kinetics for accurate estimation of virus prevalence in wastewater samples.","category":"Infection tracking support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Diversification of suppliers, demand forecasting, and inventory management","category":"Absorb resource
